lead_paragraph: Officers are searching for several young men who beat and robbed a 16-year-old on a subway train Friday. The attack echoed assaults at two McDonald’s locations in March and again last week.

headline.print_headline: Boy Is Beaten and Robbed on Subway
headline.main: Police Search for Group of Youths in L Train Beating

snippet: Officers are searching for several young men who beat and robbed a 16-year-old on a subway train Friday. The attack echoed assaults at two McDonald’s locations in March and again last week.
abstract: Police are seeking roughly five suspects following group assault and robbery of a 16-year-old boy aboard subway in Brooklyn; cellphone footage shows group of young men or teenagers; authorities say incident underscores need for additional police to prevent gang violence.
